article.title: Northrop Grumman Awarded Contract for Electronic Attack Spares and Radio Frequency Switches
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Bethpage, New York, was awarded a sole source, firm fixed price contract worth a maximum $26 million for airborne electronic attack spares and radio frequency switches.Â Using service is the U.S. Navy. The contracting activity is the Defense Logistics Agency Aviation Strategic Acquisitions at Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
